description: Tattoo, later Longstrike, is a fictional mutant character in the Marvel Comics Universe. Her first appearance was in New X-Men #126, created by Grant Morrison and Frank Quitely.
name: Tattoo
powers: Ability to form words or pictures on skin
disrupt neurochemistry of others by phasing through them.
Uses a version of the Stilt-Man armor that allows her to elongate her limbs
